class.name: PhysicsPointIntersectionResult2D
class.brief_description: Stores the results of a point intersection query.
class.description: This class contains the intersection information produced by [method PhysicsDirectSpaceState2D.intersect_point]. It stores up to a user-defined number of overlapping shapes.

method.name: get_collider
method.description: Returns the collider object at the given result index.

method.name: get_collider_id
method.description: Returns the unique ID of the collider at the given result index.

method.name: get_collider_rid
method.description: Returns the [RID] of the collider at the given result index.

method.name: get_collider_shape
method.description: Returns the shape index of the collider at the given result index.

members.member: The number of shapes that collide with the queried point.
The maximum number of collisions this result object can store.
